definition: any support where you can sit, especially the part of a chair or bench etc. on which you sit, show to a seat
details:
noun
- any support where you can sit, especially the part of a chair or bench etc. on which you sit
= example: any support where you can sit, especially the part of a chair or bench etc. on which you sit
- furniture that is designed for sitting on
= example: furniture that is designed for sitting on
- the cloth covering for the buttocks
= example: the cloth covering for the buttocks
- a part of a machine that supports or guides another part
- the legal right to sit as a member in a legislative or similar body
= example: the legal right to sit as a member in a legislative or similar body
- the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on
= synonyms: tail
- the location (metaphorically speaking) where something is based
= example: the location (metaphorically speaking) where something is based
- a space reserved for sitting, as in a theater, or on a train
= example: a space reserved for sitting, as in a theater, or on a train
= synonyms: place
- a center of authority (as a city from which authority is exercised)
verb
- show to a seat
= example: show to a seat
= synonyms: sit, sit down
- place in or on a seat
= example: place in or on a seat
- place or attach firmly in or on a base
= example: place or attach firmly in or on a base
- provide with seats
= example: provide with seats
- put a seat on a chair
- place ceremoniously or formally in an office or position
= synonyms: induct, invest
- be able to seat
= example: be able to seat
